meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Ravi Subramanian Christina McTighe Stephanie Engel Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7008.

td.p: Ravi Subramanian, a curriculum designer originally from Lexington, Kentucky
Christina McTighe, a library associate from Washington, D.C.
Stephanie Engel, a children's book managing editor from Douglassville, Pennsylvania (whose 1-day cash winnings total $21,199)

tr.td: SEUSSIAN KEYWORDS
VERMONT
TV EATERIES & DRINKERIES
(Alex: You have to identify the TV show for us.)
BRAND NAMES AROUND THE WORLD
"S" TO "T"
(Alex: Each correct response will begin with the letter "S" and end with a "T.")
I DIDN'T COME HERE TO MAKE FRIENDS

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '"Oom-pahs and boom-pahs" help this title elephant save folks from "Beezle-Nut oil"')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: "Oom-pahs and boom-pahs" help this title elephant save folks from "Beezle-Nut oil"

tr.td: The French words "vert" & "mont" mean this, giving the state its nickname as well as its name

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Stephanie
Christina
Ravi
COMMISSIONED ARTWORKS
MY MOVIES
WHAT DO YOU COLLECT?
OCEANOGRAPHY
NAME CALLING
(David Muir: I'm David Muir from ABC's World News Tonight, but much of my work is away from the anchor desk, reporting from the field.)

the temperature

ChristinaRavi
')

toggle('clue_DJ_5_1', 'clue_DJ_5_1_stuck', '(Alex: That\'s right. But I would not call you that.)
(Christina: Oh, thank you.)

Christina
')

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_DJ_6_1', 'clue_DJ_6_1_stuck', '(David Muir delivers the clue.) On August 29, 2005 I reported from inside this building where at one point 30,000 people were seeking shelter before the levees even broke')
